extensionDescription.message: Captures the web page into local storage and manages captured pages in browser sidebar. Compatible with ScrapBook documents.

STEP1_TEXT_1.message: Download ScrapBee backend executable and 2 installation files to"{FIREFOX_DOWNLOAD_DIRECTORY}/screepbee/", by just click on the button below.

STEP1_TEXT_2.message: You maybe meet problem that Firefox does not download the 3 files correctly, then you can close Firefox and remove files under"{FIREFOX_DOWNLOAD_DIRECTORY}/screepbee/", start Firefox and download again. (Please use standard version of {Firefox} 60 and later)

STEP2_TEXT_1.message: Run the installation script downloaded above manually:

STEP2_TEXT_2.message: Run the commands in your terminal:

STEP2_TEXT_3.message: You maybe need to run the script as administrator

RDF_FILES_TIP.message:
Set absolute path of rdf files(ending with extension '.rdf') to register information of scraps，downloaded scraps will be saved in "data" folder beside the rdf files.

For example： c:\scrapbee\test.rdf (Windows)
or：
/home/userID/scrapbee/test.rdf (Linux)
/Users/userID/scrapbee/test.rdf (Mac)

You can setup multiple rdf files to classify your scraps，
You can have different rdf files inside same directory.
No need to create these files maunally(Some XML tags are needed for an empty rdf file).

Good news for ScrapBook user: ScrapBook rdfs are also supported.

BACKEND_PORT_TIP.message: TCP port ScrapBee backend listens. e.g. 9900

COLOR_TIP.message:
Change color of some elements to make ScrapBee a better looking.
These colors should be in format: #FFFFFF or #FFF

OPEN_IN_CURRENT_TAB_TIP.message:
By default, ScrapBee opens each scrap in new tab when clicking on an entity,
and open scraps in current tab by holding control(meta for Mac) while clicking.
You can reverse this by turn on this option.

DONATE_WORDS.message:
To make ScrapBee grows better,
your donations are very welcome,
thanks for your support !!!
Also, please rank 5 stars if you like ScrapBee

ConfirmDeleteDirectory.message: This is a folder, do you really want delete it and items within it?

SAME_RDF_MODIFIED.message: Same rdf modified, click OK to refresh

announcement_content.message:
#1.6.0#
  • Fixed problem about it can not finish capture sometime
  • Backend updated, please re-download and install backend to get full features(less malware fake alarm and more error checking)

NODE_MOVER_TIP.message: With this tool, you can move or copy nodes and their contents between 2 rdfs (book trees), draging nodes within one rdf is also available here.

NODE_MOVER_WARN_TIP.message:
BE CARE!!! THIS IS AN EXPERIMENTAL-FEATURE.
Please make sure you'v backup your data before using this tool.
Actions on heavy nodes are not recommended.
Do not make changes somewhere else while using this tool or it may causes conflicts.
